dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.time.CalendarToDo
dataStructure.description:
This represents 'an action-item or assignment. For example, it can be used to represent an item of work assigned to an individual; such as "turn in travel expense today".'

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CalendarToDo

child.name: dueDate
child.description:
the DateTime the toDo is expected to be completed

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: dueDate

child.name: actionItem
child.description:
This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: actionItem

child.name: percentComplete
child.description:
shows progress from 0 (not started to 100 (complete)

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: percentComplete

child.name: actualCompletionDate
child.description:
the date the toDo was actually completed

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: actualCompletionDate
